prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "5-Minute Veggie Egg Noodles (Stovetop)",
  "description": "Quick, mild stir-fried instant noodles with egg and mixed vegetables in a simple soy sauce. Budget-friendly and satisfying for one.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "prep_steps": [
    "1) Boil water in a kettle or pot for the noodles.",
    "2) Slice spring onion; keep green tops separate for garnish.",
    "3) Beat eggs in a small bowl with a pinch of salt.",
    "4) Peel and finely chop garlic.",
    "5) In a cup, mix soy sauce with 1 tablespoon water."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "1) Cook instant noodles in boiling water for 2–3 minutes until just tender; drain and set aside.",
    "2) Heat canola oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat.",
    "3) Add garlic and the white parts of spring onion; cook 20–30 seconds until fragrant.",
    "4) Add frozen mixed vegetables; stir-fry 2–3 minutes until hot.",
    "5) Push vegetables to the side; pour in beaten eggs and scramble just set.",
    "6) Add drained noodles and soy sauce mixture; toss 30–60 seconds to coat.",
    "7) Turn off heat, stir in sesame oil, black pepper, and spring onion greens. Taste and add a pinch of salt if needed. Serve immediately."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "instant noodles",
      "quantity": "1 cake (about 80–90 g)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "eggs",
      "quantity": "2 medium",
      "preparation": "beaten"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "frozen mixed vegetables",
      "quantity": "1 cup (about 120 g)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "soy sauce",
      "quantity": "1.5 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "1 clove",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spring onion",
      "quantity": "1 stalk",
      "preparation": "sliced, greens reserved"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "canola oil",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sesame oil",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "Pinch"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "Pinch",
      "preparation": "to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian",
      "Omnivore"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Egg",

      "Soy"
    ],

      "ValueStaples"
    ],

      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
